_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The ascetics and brahmins who don’t trul: Don’t truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ origin
Don’t truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ ending
Don’t truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ gratification
Don’t truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ drawback
Don’t truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ escape
The ascetics and brahmins who do truly u: Do truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ origin
Do truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ ending
Do truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ gratification
Do truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ drawback
Do truly understand the five grasping aggregates’ escape
